label: Behavior 27928662
summary: Vessel behavior pattern: navigating along a fixed route (the persistent alignment between COG and heading, combined with stable speed and negligible course deviation, indicates the vessel is following a straight, predefined maritime route; the position progression follows a linear trajectory moving south-southeast, approximated by the parametric equations: lat(t) ≈ 55.255965 - 0.0087 × t, lon(t) ≈ 7.420037 + 0.0015 × t, where t is normalized time index from 0 to 1 over the observed segment)
